description:
Hello testers! we've been working non-stop to make CastView the best new tab for anyone,
with this update we introduce some small, breaking changes:

changes.title: ⛅ did someone say weather?
changes.description: We added a new feature to CastView that allows you to see the weather for a location, how cool is that?

changes.title: ⚡ did someone say speed?
changes.description: With the power of technology™️, CastView is faster than ever!
